spec_data.Name: vala-devel
spec_data.Description:
Vala is a new programming language that aims to bring modern programming
language features to GNOME developers without imposing any additional
runtime requirements and without using a different ABI compared to
applications and libraries written in C.

This package contains development files for vala. This is not
necessary for using the vala compiler.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 08 Oct 2017 06:53:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
